item.description:
Let's gather and get to know each other. I'm not sure that I'm capable of leading an OPAR study group, but I am quite capable of socializing!

For those who want to study OPAR, feel free to join us & we can figure out who will lead the study group, when and where you want to meet to study.

I hear that our old Starbucks was undergoing renovation, so I moved it to the Starbucks up the street on Boylston across from the Pru, between Exeter and Fairfield.

You should be able to find me pretty easily -- I will wear some kind of dollar-sign bling bling!

group.name: The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup Group

item.name: November Meetup
